title: Weird lagging...
body: My friends are having the same problem as me...Sometimes we just can't do anything in game, but we can see everything going on. The strange thing is game shows that our ping is always around 30ms, but we just couldn't move. Anyone knows why?

replies.body: You might be having a poor connection issue or packet loss that's causing this problem, so you can't communicate what you're doing to the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches for an overview.  Let me know what results you find.

I have checked my logs before, the packet loss started since Oct. 2016, before that everything was just fine. Now I gets a average of around 50 packets loss per min, which is really bad cos I can't control my champ. Btw my friend just lost a rank game by it, feels bad. The Ping is usually stable in around 25 - 50 ms which is ok.

Thanks for the update!  So the ping is okay, but you have packet loss.  In this case, either your network is having issues locally holding a connection to the game servers or your ISP has changed in the way it routes there.  As a first step, try the entirety of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities with local issues.  Test it in custom games and me know what happens!
